summary: DexiNed encapsulates the DXtrem deep neural network architecture for image edge detection. It processes an input image tensor and produces a hierarchy of intermediate feature maps, with the final output being a single‑channel edge probability map of the same spatial dimensions as the input.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use, high‑performance edge detection component that can be integrated into computer‑vision systems for tasks such as scene understanding, object segmentation, image preprocessing, and visual analytics.
